<h3>**Hello world!**</h3>

<h2 class="custom-subtitle">

Welcome to my world!

</h2>

This website will explore my adventures around the world!

I will be using leaflet to create an interactive map of my travels

https://quarto.org/docs/interactive/widgets/htmlwidgets.html

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=-77.4169, lat=39.1459, popup="Hometown")
```
